content: the pattern is written for child teen and adult size one size 52-56 but can be easily modified for baby size just by decreasing number of chains twist headband is a nice and warm project that can be done within 1-2 hours it also can be a great item for last minute gift you are welcome to follow my **youtube channel** https //www youtube com/channel/ucwqwxlyqk9vjedzoiqjw-wa you are welcome to follow me on **facebook** https //www facebook com/groups/crazyhands net/ **instagram ** https //www instagram com/amurushka_amur/ **fur pom poms shop** http //crazyhands net/shop/
